adminSettingsPage.title: System Settings

adminSettingsPage.totalLevelsDesc: Define how many total levels will be in the system. Bonus levels will be automatically interspersed between regular levels.

adminSettingsPage.info1: Regular levels will be displayed with numbers (1, 2, 3...)
adminSettingsPage.info2: Bonus levels will be displayed with star icons
adminSettingsPage.info3: Bonuses are automatically interspersed every 3 regular levels
adminSettingsPage.info4: Slots without created challenges will appear as "locked"
adminSettingsPage.previewDesc: This is how tabs will look with {count} total levels:

teamComponent.teamDescription: We employ passionate, full-service personnel. Our team is made up of professionals committed to excellence and client satisfaction.

techForge.missionDesc: Our mission is to drive innovation and digital transformation through cutting-edge technological solutions. We are committed to working closely with our clients to understand their specific needs and offer them high-quality products and services that drive their success in an increasingly digitized world.
techForge.visionDesc: We strive to be recognized as leaders in the field of technological development, standing out for our excellence in creating innovative and personalized solutions. We aspire to be the trusted partner of our clients, consistently exceeding their expectations and contributing to the growth and expansion of their businesses in the digital landscape.

servicesPage.metaTitle: Watermelon Code - Frontend Web Development and Branding Services
servicesPage.metaDescription: Watermelon Code offers specialized frontend web development services in creating attractive and functional websites and applications. We also provide branding services to develop a solid and coherent brand identity, including logo design, colors and visual elements. Contact us for more information.
servicesPage.description: We offer specialized frontend web development services in creating attractive and functional websites and applications. Using the latest technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript, we design intuitive and responsive user interfaces that reflect our clients' brand identity and enhance their online presence.

testimonialsPage.bio: With passion in every trick, I chase glory on wheels. Ready to conquer the competition!
